songs.title: Rare, Part 2
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I been in the wonder, I'm thinkin' to grab the clip
Two, three niggas is dead before they could dip
I'm not into blasphemous acts, but see the brothers they act
Federal tracks, they splattin' at your back, hit 'em
You been waitin', watchin' with this shit
Blood up on the pussy niggas cough before we hit
Slide up on the fucker, holy water on the clip
I just hit the fucker for his loot and then I dip
Slick Scott, skinny scissorhands cut his fanny pack
Bullet proof vest upon his chest to get revenge back
Black Richie Rich gon' hold the clip until the feds pop
I karate chop the pussy 'fore they knocked his head off
Frolick pussy faggot, little maggot, I decipher this
Did the little nigga paint his sealant like the dentist did
I'm gonna hit up Dennis, fuck a sentence, let's go hit a lick
Told my mother, look at this, I'ma' fuckin' slit my wrists

[Interlude]
Yeah

[Chorus]
Pussy, want an argument, bullet dem cyaan test
This is not a battle, a war or conquest
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Cyaan tek mi yout' dem fuck what dem waan seh
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept, yeah
Pussy want an argument, bullet dem cyaan test
This is not a battle, a war or conquest
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Cyaan tek mi yout' dem fuck what dem waan seh
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept
Very fuckin' rare with the pistol, the concept, yeah
